Text: It is clear that the ocean has been bearing the brunt of climate change to date, but untapped ocean-related approaches to fighting climate change could play a large role in capping climate change at 1.5 degrees Celsius above pre-Industrial Age levels as called for in the 2016 Paris Agreement.
Cause: It is clear that the ocean has been bearing the brunt of climate change to date, but untapped ocean-related approaches to fighting climate change
Effect: capping climate change at 1.5 degrees Celsius above pre-Industrial Age levels as called for in the 2016 Paris Agreement.
Sentence: <e1>It is clear that the ocean has been bearing the brunt of climate change to date, but untapped ocean-related approaches to fighting climate change</e1> could play a large role in <e2>capping climate change at 1.5 degrees Celsius above pre-Industrial Age levels as called for in the 2016 Paris Agreement.</e2>
